title: China’s GDP Data Delay Points to Murky Economic Picture
description: The delay in announcing routine growth data this week was only the latest example of how hard it has become to peer into China’s economy, the world’s second largest.
dc:creator: Keith Bradsher
media:credit: Qilai Shen for The New York Times
media:description: Morning commuters in the Lujiazui Financial District of Shanghai.
